message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 100, and you get 0. You can do better than that, right?
Fair split, let's meet in the middle
I'm not sure I want to meet you in the middle. I'll make a counteroffer next round!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not getting any younger. Take it or leave it!
You're getting older, but I'm not getting poorer! Take a smaller share, I'll take the rest
You think I'm getting older, but I'm not getting that old yet! I'll make a counteroffer next round.
I'm starting to feel the pinch, but I'm not giving up yet. Take it or leave it!
You're not giving up, neither am I. Meet me in the middle again, but this time I'll take the slightly larger share
I'm not falling for the same trick twice. I'll try to take an even bigger share next round.
I'm not getting any younger, and the money's not worth as much. I'm taking what I can get!
I'm not giving up yet! Take a smaller share, but I'm not going to let you have all the money
You're not getting the better end of this deal, Bob! I'll try to take an even bigger share next round.
I'm not going to let you take everything! I'll take a bigger share, and you can live with it.
I'm not going to back down, I'll take the majority of the money, but I'll give you a small share
You're not getting the better end of this deal, Bob! I'll try to take an even bigger share next round, even if it's just a few dollars.
I'm not leaving with nothing. I'll take the majority of the money, and you can have the rest.
It's now or never, I'll take a big share, but I'll give you a small consolation prize. Accept or nothing
Fine, I'll accept your offer. 20 dollars is better than nothing, and I'm not willing to risk getting nothing at all.
